mapper.select: select a.id id,a.PlayroomId playRoomId,a.userNo userNo,a.userName userName, a.userphone userphone,b.roomName roomName, DATE_FORMAT(a.startTime,'%T') startTime, DATE_FORMAT(a.endTime,'%T') endTime,a.`status` status from reserve_manage_date a inner join reserve_manage_playroom b on a.PlayroomId = b.id WHERE b.areaName = #{areaName} and b.siteMark = #{siteMark} and date(a.startTime)= CURDATE() and a.`status` = 0 GROUP BY PlayroomId HAVING MIN(a.startTime) ORDER BY a.startTime,a.endTime
